== Ennakkad (628267) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Ennakkad is a village in the [[Chengannur]] taluka of [[Alappuzha]] district with an area of 1295 hectares and harbouring 4860 households with total population of 18444 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Chengannur]] is at a distance of 9 km. Male population is 8710 and female population is 9734. Scheduled Caste Population is 3586 and Scheduled Tribes population is 46. Census Location Code of the village is 628267<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 16283 (88.28%)
* Literate male population: 7707 (88.48%)
* Literate female population: 8576 (88.1%)
